description: The whole family will love the homemade smoky beef filling in this delicious steak and onion pie baked until golden with shortcrust and puff pastry.
name: Family Steak & Onion Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.5 sheets frozen puff pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Place pastry over pie filling, then use your fingers to crimp edges to seal. Using picture as a guide, cut small leaves from remaining puff pastry, then score to decorate. Brush unscored side of each leaf with a little egg. Arrange leaves, unscoredsides down, on top of pie. Brush pie all over with egg. Bake for 1 hour or until pastry is golden brown and filling is hot. Serve.
